description: Parsley and mint give a herby lift to this fresh and light garlic potato salad, perfect for a BBQ.
keywords: Potato salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Parsley & Garlic Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch parsley, fresh, leaves picked, chopped
0.5 bunch mint, fresh, leaves picked, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes in a large pan of boiling water and cook for 10-12 minutes, until tender. Drain well.
Add the chopped herbs, spring onions, lemon juice, garlic and olive oil to a large bowl.
Tip in the warm potatoes, toss well and serve.
